thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Eric St-Louis
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Eric St-Louis

author: Eric St-Louis
title: Eric St-Louis
text: My problem was resolved within 48 hours of lodging my complaint. I was treated quickly, fairly and to my complete satisfaction. I have already made several purchases and based on past experience and the excellent customer service I do not hesitate to recommend them highly. I will purchase again without any doubt.
